openTextUrl

        

        
        
openTextUrl is string -> {
   close is () -> (),
   `contents is () -> string,
   lines is () -> list<string>,
   rawClose is () -> (),
   read is number -> string,
   readln is () -> string
}

module yeti.http;

load yeti.lang.io;

{
    openTextUrl url is string -> 'a =
        conn = new java.net.URL(url)#openConnection();
        stream = conn#getInputStream();
        contentType = conn#getContentType();
        cs = strTrim (strRightOf 'CHARSET=' (strUpper contentType));
        inputHandle stream if cs != '' then cs else 'ISO-8859-1' fi,

    getTextByUrl url =
        (openTextUrl url).contents ()
}
